posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Quick Start2Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy Deploy to remote sites1123456789101112131415161718192021222324$ hexo deploy``` #### Deploy to remote sites2``` bash$ hexo deploy``` #### Deploy to remote sites3``` bash$ hexo deploy``` More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)## Quick Start3### Create a new post``` bash$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Quick Start3Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Quick Start3Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Quick Start3Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
